alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Trumbull and central Mahoning Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lordstown, or 10 miles south of Warren, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Cortland, Lordstown, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Poland, Ellsworth and Craig Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
